name: LangChain Production QA Evaluation
description: QA pairs for evaluating RAG system on LangChain production topics

questions.question: What are the key differences between Qdrant and ChromaDB for production use?
questions.expected_answer: Qdrant is recommended for production due to better scalability and performance, while ChromaDB has limitations for production deployments.

questions.question: What three-tier caching strategy should be implemented?
questions.expected_answer: 1. Embedding cache (Redis, TTL: 7 days), 2. Query result cache (Redis, TTL: 1 hour), 3. Session cache (in-memory, TTL: 30 minutes)

questions.question: What are the four hallucination mitigation techniques mentioned?
questions.expected_answer: 1. Multi-Query Retrieval, 2. Chain-of-Verification, 3. Self-Reflection, 4. Confidence Scoring

questions.question: What latency targets should be set for P95 retrieval and generation?
What are the critical alert thresholds for error rate and latency?
What embedding models provide the best quality vs speed balance?
questions.expected_answer: all-mpnet-base-v2 for highest quality, all-MiniLM-L6-v2 for speed/quality balance
